title: Draw Slasher v1.0.2
description:
Meet Hanzo. Heâ€™s a ninja. 

While he was training â€˜out thereâ€™ the Pirate Monkey Zombiesâ„¢ - stupid, ugly, smelly, rotten and disgusting creatures - kidnapped his family. Take control of his awesome blade and aid him in the quest to free them.

You need just your finger to play. Draw a line to jump, dash, dodge and slash. Tap to run. Pinch the screen to summon powerful Ninjutsu Techniques - super-efficient against the 'rottents'.

YOUR FINGER IS THE ULTIMATE WEAPON!

What's new:

Konnichiwa Fellow Ninjas!
Vicious Pirate Monkey Zombies have changed the app's name, but our support ninjas managed to neutralize the threat.
Also, an issue regarding Google Play Services has been fixed as well.
Stay focused!
Sayonara!

More info:
 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.masscreation.drawSlasher
